page.title: 11FRUIT FARMING IN LYNSTED
page.content: The main fruit farm in Lynsted is called F.T.Holt & Son. About 6 people drive lorries of fruit to the market. As the months pass they have different fruits. In the summer cherries come. Soon after that it is plums. At Bouchers Farm he mainly deals with apple picking & a small amount of cherries to go with the apples. I have got a plum orchard owned by Holt at the side of my house. The trees were planted two years ago. Also at the back of my house there is a pear orchard. We call it the plantation. At the back of Mill Cottage down the road are cabbages. Many of the mothers in the area have no jobs in the winter but like to work in the fields in the summer. At the Kent Show in July, Holt sends off some apples ad other fruits to be judged there.
